lead_paragraph: KAUFMAN--Isaac J.,died on Tuesday, March 8th. Isi was born in Antwerp in 1929, the youngest son of Aron and Lana (nee Nathanson) Kaufman. He is survived by his wife of 62 years, Sonia Kaufman (nee Silberman), daughter Rabbi Lilly Kaufman, son Berl Kaufman and wife Dana Galin; granddaughters Leora and Kate; brothers Jacob and wife Ruth, Abe and wife Clarita, and many nieces and nephews. His dear granddaughter Anna predeceased him. Partner with his brothers in Aron Kaufman & Co for over 60 years, he was known in the diamond trade for his wit, honesty and skill. An exceptional investor, philosopher and musician, he loved his family with all his heart. Funeral services at Plaza Community Chapel on Thursday, March 10 at 12 noon. Shiva at 515 East 79th St. 1/3
